extension.name: cenere-free
extension.author: Francesco Zaniol
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 only , European Union Public License v1.1 only, other
extension.description:
Cenere (free)

Template version: 4.0.0

Documentation

Learn here the template snippets
Learn here the module positions
More resources at www.accessibletemplate.com

Contacts, bugs, translations and feedbacks

Your feedback and advices are very valuable to us. Please do not hesitate to contact us at info@accessibletemplate.com if you: found a bug, have any suggestions on how to improve our templates and their accessibility, found a broken translation.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_logoPath
field.label: Your logo:
field.description: Choose the file for your logo. If no file is selected the default template logo is displayed

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_logoLink
field.label: Logo as a link?
field.description: If true, the logo will be a link to the site homepage

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_logoWidth
field.label: Logo max-width (in px)
field.description: Leave this field to "auto" if you want to keep the original size of the image. Note: if a max-width is set, the height will be calculated by the browser.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_showLogo_mobile
field.label: Enable custom logo for mobile layout?

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_logoPath_mobile
field.label: Select custom logo for mobile layout:

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_fullWidthLogo
field.label: Full width logo? (only in centered alignment)
field.description: If enabled, the logo will always stretch to the layout width (the max-width option will be ignored). This option is enabled only if "Logo/Title/Subtitle alignment" is set to "center".

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_websiteFavicon
field.label: Your favicon:
field.description: The favicon image is usually 16x16 pixels

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_fontSize
field.label: Root font size (in %)
field.description: Note: for accessibility reasons the root font-size is set as a relative unit. The default value is 100%, which is usually equal to 16px depending on the client's browser preferences.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_maxLayoutWidth
field.label: Site container max-width (in px)
field.description: Set a width for the main content column

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_floating_submenus_effect
field.label: Sub-menus effect
field.description: Note: these effects are active only on modern browsers.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_customWidth_leftRightColumn
field.label: Custom width for left/right columns?
field.description: Enable a custom width for the left and/or right columns? If set to "Default", the default width is applied. If set to "Custom", the chosen width is applied.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customWidth_leftColumn
field.label: Left column width (in %)
field.description: The Default value is 17% when the right column is displayed; otherwise it is 20%.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customWidth_rightColumn
field.label: Right column width (in %)
field.description: The Default value is 17% when the left column is displayed; otherwise it is 20%.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_top_button_default_layout
field.label: Enable "Top" button?
field.description: This button is placed just above the footer.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable____mobileSwitcherBtn
field.label: Enable "Switch to desktop site" link?
field.description: This link appears at the end of the page, note that it is showed only on mobile devices

field.label: Tip for accessibility: choose colors that provide sufficient contrast between the text and the background. Use the Color Contrast Checker to reach at least level WCAG AA.
This feature is not available in the free edition.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_fullWidthHomepage
field.label: Full-width Homepage? (read tooltip)
field.description: If enabled, the main content area of the homepage will be full-width with no margin and padding, also, aside-top/bottom and left/right columns are disabled. This option is useful to build a landing page.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customColor_buttons_BorderStyle
field.label: border style
field.description: Select CSS border style, i.e. "solid", "dotted", "dashed"

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customColor_buttons_BorderWidth
field.label: border width
field.description: Example: write "1px" if you want to specify a measure in all four sides of the box (top, left, bottom and right). Instead, write "1px 0px 3px 2px" if you need to specify different measures for the sides (in this case, "1px" for top, "0px" for right, "3px" for bottom and "2px" for the left side)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customColor_buttons_BorderRadius
field.label: border radius
field.description:
Example: write "5px" if you want to specify a measure for all the four edges of the box (top-left, top-right, bottom-right and bottom-left). Instead, write "4px 3px 2px 1px" if you need to specify different measures for each edge (in this case, "4px" for top-left, "3px" for top-right, "2px" for bottom-right and "1px" for bottom-left)
ATTENTION: this option doesn't work on old browsers (i.e. Internet Explorer 8/7/6)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customColor_tables_BorderStyle
field.label: border style
field.description: Select CSS border style, i.e. "solid", "dotted", "dashed"

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_customColor_tables_BorderWidth
field.label: border width
field.description: Example: write "1px" if you want to specify a measure in all four sides of the box (top, left, bottom and right). Instead, write "1px 0px 3px 2px" if you need to specify different measures for the sides (in this case, "1px" for top, "0px" for right, "3px" for bottom and "2px" for the left side)

field.label:
The Advanced Layout Customization is not available in the free edition.

Many other customization options are available in the Premium edition.

Styles available:
- Default: default style is set, some margins and paddings applied.
- Plain: no style set, some margins and paddings applied.
- None: no style set, no margins nor padding.
- Light: a light style set, some margins and paddings applied.
- Dark: a dark style set, some margins and paddings applied.
- Menu container: set this style if the module contains a menu
- {color}: colored module, some margins and paddings applied.
- User custom {n}: Define your custom style below

The Custom User Module Style is not available in the free edition.

In the Premium edition you can specify three module styles with your own custom colors. You can choose: Module background, module border style and color, module text color, module links color, module margin and padding.

The Custom Font feature is not available in the free edition.

The following options are available in the Premium edition:

- Google Font Import
- Custom Font Setup (General template font, headings font, site title font, site subtitle font, main menu font)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_googleAnalytics_ID
field.label: Google Analytics Tracking ID (read tooltip)
field.description: Please note: do not write "UA-". For example, a correct value would be "12345-6"

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_googleAnalytics_anonymizationEnabled
field.label: Enable Google Analytics Anonymization? (read tooltip)
field.description: This feature offers more privacy to your visitors (deletion of the last octet of the IP-address prior to storage). It is designed to help site owners comply with their own privacy policies or, in some countries, recommendations from local data protection authorities.

field.label: (To show the panel, load a module into position "alerts-panel")

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_alertsPanel_cookieAware
field.label: Hide forever after closing?
field.description: If true, the panel will be hidden forever once closed. If false, the panel will be showed any time a module is loaded.

field.label: The social options are not available in the free edition.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam__print_show_header
field.label: When printing, show site banner? (logo, title and subtitle)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_custom_user_inlineCSS
field.label: Your Custom CSS
field.description:
Use this textarea to add your custom CSS and override the native template style (we discourage modifications to the template's CSS files).
Alternatively to this textarea, you can include your own CSS in overrides.css (see option below)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_user_overrides_css
field.label: Enable "overrides.css"?
field.description: Use this file to include style overrides. It is located at TEMPLATE_DIRECTORY/zf/custom/overrides/assets/css/overrides.css

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_user_overrides_js
field.label: Enable "overrides.js"?
field.description: Use this file to override the native template functions. This file is located at TEMPLATE_DIRECTORY/zf/custom/overrides/assets/js/overrides.js

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_php_debugger
field.label: Enable PHP debugger?
field.description: Attention: enable during developing only, keep this option disabled in production

field.label: The following controls may be useful if your website has special accessibility requirements or if it contains long articles/posts.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable___theme_switcher
field.label: Enable theme switcher? (read tooltip)
field.description: Note: the inverted theme is not supported by some old browsers. It is also disabled in mobile layout because some low-end devices may suffer from performance issues.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enableHiddenHeadingsDefaultLayout
field.label: Enable "section headings" and HTML5 semantic tags?
field.description: This template uses hidden headings (readable only by screenreaders) and semantic tags to define the document outline.

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_enable_quickAccessMenu_defaultLayout
field.label: Enable "Skip links"?
field.description: To see this menu, use keyboard only navigation (TAB key)

field.name: zhongframework_Jparam_altLogo
field.label: Site logo "alt" attribute: (read tooltip)
field.description: If this field is left empty, the alt attribute of the logo will be the site title as set in Joomla's global configuration.
